data.md:MetaData: Description of lithologic section units of IODP Hole 325-M0054B

Drilling Depth Methods: DSF: tag sea floor, CSF: let overlap if long, CCSF: let overlap if long. Elevation Start = drill string tagging seabed including predicted tidal variations, Elevation End = corrected EM300 echo sounder data.
Proceedings of the Integrated Ocean Drilling Program
